attributes.action: To Stop Arriva Trains Taking over from Virgin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Arriva Trains, will be whacking up the Prices, as already stated. We want to stop this. The Franchise was suppost to make Train journeys Cheaper and better. Arriva Trains offer less discount to Disabled, they removed the Cheaper Tickets and run regularly late. Will Arriva spend the Money Virgin has and keep the prices the same. NO so why is this Goverment choosing the Expensive option for passengers. Grab your Keys, it be cheaper Driving soon.
